channel.title: Need a client coder [317] Stats can't go above 1063 [317-Delta]

item.title: Need a client coder [317] Stats can't go above 1063 [317-Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

317-Delta
Hey guys when i max Health 1063 it works Its fine but if i make it 1064
Server wont load is there anything i can do to edit the client so it will work?
says
317-Delta

SOMEONE HAS SENT IN A INCOMPLETE PACKET

Really need this to work for my WoW-scape project.

i have decided its based on this

Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(j - 32, l + 16, i1, 0x252019, 9, 0);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(j - 32, l + 16, i1, 0x000001, 1, 0);
int k1 = ((j - 32) * j) / j1;
if(k1 < 8)
k1 = 8;
int l1 = ((j - 32 - k1) * k) / (j1 - j);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(k1, l + 16 + l1, i1, anInt1063, 16, 0);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method341(l + 16 + l1, 0x000001, k1, i1, anInt1135);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method341(l + 16 + l1, 0x817051, k1, i1 + 1, anInt1135);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method341(l + 16 + l1, 0x73654a, k1, i1 + 2, anInt1135);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method341(l + 16 + l1, 0x6a5c43, k1, i1 + 3, anInt1135);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method341(l + 16 + l1, 0x6a5c43, k1, i1 + 4, anInt1135);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method341(l + 16 + l1, 0x655841, k1, i1 + 5, anInt1135);
Class30_Sub2_Sub1.method336(k1, l + 16 + l1, i1, anInt1063, 16, 0);

Already tried changing the 1063 to another number any other number makes it crash

Read full topic
